Our people have not felt as they should the necessity of this matter, and it has therefore been neglected. The churches have been thoughtless, and, though the light of the word of God has been shining upon their pathway, they have neglected this most sacred duty. The Lord is greatly displeased with this neglect of His faithful servants.  Our people should be as willing to assist these persons when in adverse circumstances as 
                                                                           65
they have been willing to accept their means and services when in health.
